title: The Hunt by Allison Brennan [Predator #2] (Retail) {Rose88}
description:
Title: The Hunt (Predator #2)
Author: Allison Brennan
Published: Jan 2006
Publisher: Ballantine Books
ISBN: 978-0-345-49074-2
Format: Epub (Retail)
Language: English
Genres: Fiction, Mystery, Suspense

Touched by a killer, she feels the fire of revenge.
Twelve years ago, Miranda Moore miraculously survived the torture of a serial killer who was never caught. Since then, Miranda, a former FBI trainee and now a member of a local search-and-rescue squad, has witnessed with horror the recovery of the mutilated bodies of seven young women, all victims of her tormentor, known as The Butcher. When another beautiful Montana college student goes missing, the Feds get involved, and an agent, a man Miranda once trusted with her heart, arrives to take over the investigationÃ¢â‚¬â€forcing her toward a painful choice.

Now, while Miranda battles her demons, while friends, lovers, and traitors are caught up in a frantic race against time, a killer hides in plain sightÃ¢â‚¬â€waiting to finish the one hunt he has left undone.
After the hunt, go in for the kill.
